Description:
Detects the load of known vulnerable drivers via the file name of the drivers.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Vulnerable Driver Load By Name
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (image_loaded="*\\panmonfltx64.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\dbutil.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\fairplaykd.sys" OR image_loaded="*\\nvaudio.sys" OR
